name: Bring Them Together for Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM 2022

description:
[PLAY in FULLSCREEN] for best experience and bug in Resolution... 

or Download "RAR" version there is no resolution bug..

Bring Them Together is a small game made for Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM 2022.

It is about dragging your mouse making up a bridge to bring characters back together.

Will you succeed? 

Visit my Youtube Channel for more :
